name: F is for Forward!
description:
F is for forward, B is for Backwards, T to turn, I think you get the picture.  In theory, anybody could pick this game up and know exactly how to control it.  That doesn't necessarily mean it'll be easy, though.  It could possibly be described as "Overly intuitive."

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020!  The theme was "Out of control"
